text: Margaret Chin (born May 26, 1954) is a Chinese-American politician. She is a council member for the 1st District of the New York City Council. A Democrat, she makes up the Asian American delegation of the city council. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Margaret Chin
